DOC.brief_summary: Insect bite relate symptom ( pruritus papule ) cause release histamine mast cell skin . Topical anti-histaminics use promote relief symptom . Dexchlorpheniramine maleate 1 % cream topical anti-histaminic formulation approve ANVISA Brazil relief skin irritation allergy , include one cause insect bite . The aim present study demonstrate non-inferiority new pharmacological preparation dexchlorpheniramine maleate ( 1 % lotion ) standard preparation ( 1 % cream ) relief insect bite relate symptom demonstrate safety preparation .
DOC.brief_title: Non-inferiority Clinical Trial Dexchlorpheniramine ( Cream Versus Lotion ) Relief Insect Bite Related Symptoms
